page.title: 13JOBS
page.content: The paperboy delivers our newspapers everyday.They deliver at different times of the day.They deliver local and national newspapers.In Stratford we have two local papers called the Stratford Herald and the Midweek News. The Midweek News is a free newspaper and comes out every Tuesday.It employs 157 boys and 98 girls making a total of 255 delivers. Here are some of the main areas which receive the Midweek News.Next to them are how many papers are delivered The figures are to the nearest 500. STRATFORD 10000 papers WARWICK 9500 papers ALCESTER 2500 papers STUDLEY 2500 papers SOUTHAM 2000 papers WELSBOURNE 2000 papers HENELY_IN_ARDEN 1500 papers SHIPSTON_ON_STOUR 1500 papers
